description: Approval of Details pursuant to condition 10 (Sound Insulation) and partial approval of Details pursuant to condition 3 (Materials) of planning permission P2017/0006/S73.  The following parts of condition 3 are approved: (a) brickwork.  The following parts of condition 3 are partially approved: (b) windows for 46 Essex Road, but not for the approved extension or for replacement windows to 162 Packington Street; (c) entrance doors for 160 Packington Street and 46 Essex Road but not for the approved extension; (d/j) the horizontal steel beam between ground and first floors at 46 Essex Road.
decision_conditions: You are reminded that notwithstanding any reference to materials (including colours) contained within the hereby approved details, the provisions of the other conditions of planning permission P2017/0006/S73 apply, and that no external materials are permitted to be constructed or fixed to the building other than those expressly desxribed in the description of the development on this notice, or otherwise approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing pursuant to condition 3 of planning permission P2017/006/S73.
